p: Average precipitation suitability index values decreased during each growth stage from 1965 to 2014. During the sowing-emergence stage, the average precipitation suitability index decreased slightly from 0.348 to 0.346. During the emergence-flowering stage, the average precipitation suitability index decreased from 0.445 to 0.440. During the flowering-maturity stage, the change in average precipitation suitability index was relatively large and decreased 0.07 every ten years, fluctuating between 0.573 and 0.540.
